desc: Part of partnerships team, where contributed on partnerships program from Razorpay.
Run a few successfull migrations for critical operations.
Part of partnerships team, where worked on Integration of Vimeo-Create for various partners like ConstantContacts and Facebook.
Identified and fix the routing issues in the internal framework.
Change in code generation scripts for routing files.
Developed video tagging pipeline (pre downloads service).
Fixed multiple issues in SDK for Vimeo-Create integration, like overlay and post message communication.
Worked on authentication, app capabilities, and session for cookies, JWT interoperability for 3rd party cookies blocked use cases.
Worked on user management, notification, workflows, authentication, and RBAC (role-based access control) services.
Developed a TCP layer proxy for AWS Lambda and PostgreSQL communication with no persistent connection.
Implemented data fetching connectors through FTP/SFTP.
Integrated Sisnese (BI tool) in frontend application.
Used multiple AWS services like Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, S3, Cloudfront, EC2, IAM, SQS for developing application modules.
Optimized frontend delivery by code-splitting and a implementing a better caching strategy (edge caching and object expiration).
Developed a component library from scratch for moving presentational components out of the business application.
Built automated data fetching pipeline from mintuk.bvdinfo.com and google big query.
